blogPost.excerpt: Your friends at Voodle have flipped the script on what strategic offsites, creative brainstorming and team building can look like for distributed teams. Download this FREE toolkit to help kickstart your async offsite today.
blogPost.body: Your friends at Voodle have flipped the script on what strategic offsites, creative brainstorming and team building can look like for distributed teams. Download this FREE toolkit to help kickstart your async offsite today.
blogPost.title: Async Offsite-in-a-Box by Voodle - Your free toolkit to rethink offsites for distributed teams
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 您在Voodle的朋友们已经翻开了关于分布式团队的战略异地、创造性头脑风暴和团队建设的剧本。今天就下载这个免费的工具包来帮助你启动异步异地。
localize.tagline: 你的免费工具箱，重新思考分布式团队的异地问题

localize.description: 您在Voodle的朋友們已經翻開了關於分佈式團隊的戰略異地、創造性頭腦風暴和團隊建設的劇本。今天就下載這個免費的工具包來幫助你啓動異步異地。
localize.tagline: 你的免費工具箱，重新思考分佈式團隊的異地問題

previous.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
previous.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle

localize.description: Blixi是一款轻松的益智游戏，拥有精美的neumorphic设计和创新的新鲜玩法。在不断更新的排行榜上，与来自世界各地的玩家一起争夺最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休闲游戏。
Blixi是一款輕鬆的益智遊戲，擁有精美的neumorphic設計和創新的新鮮玩法。在不斷更新的排行榜上，與來自世界各地的玩家一起爭奪最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休閒遊戲。
